dict.acceptation: 有希望地；有前途地；抱有希望地；

sent.orig: Hopefully?hopefully? hopefully, in your terms of time, you may get a glimpse of what I mean.
sent.trans: 希望，非常希望你们用你们对时间的理解对我所说的意思有所瞥见。

sent.orig: Hopefully right team with the right price will come along some day, hopefully.
sent.trans: 希望一支有着合适价格的好球队会出现，希望。

sent.orig: Well hopefully you got your DTMF generator and emitter working in an afternoon or two.
sent.trans: 非常希望你在一两个下午让你的DTMF发生器与发射器正常工作。

sent.orig: Hopefully, we can again and build a better world on Mars.
sent.trans: 乐观的是，我们可以在火星上重新建立一个更加美好的新世界。

sent.orig: Come playoffs, hopefully a rejuvenated Andrew Bynum all the way to the parade route on Figueroa!
sent.trans: 季后赛来了，希望湖人可以在健康的拜纳姆回归后扬帆启程，一路乘风破浪！
